verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> "You and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>house<s%> with you shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H4720>sanctuary;<s%> and you and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> with you shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of your <S%H3550>priesthood.<s%>

Your <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H4294>also,<s%> the tribe of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of your <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H7126>bring<s%> near with <S%H3867>you,<s%> that they may be joined to <S%H8334>you,<s%> and minister to <S%H1121>you:<s%> but you and your sons with you shall be <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony.<s%>

They shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> your <S%H4931>commands,<s%> and the <S%H4931>duty<s%> of all the <S%H168>Tent:<s%> only they shall not come <S%H7126>near<s%> to the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> and to the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> that they not <S%H4191>die,<s%> neither they, nor you.

They shall be <S%H3867>joined<s%> to <S%H8104>you,<s%> and keep the <S%H4931>responsibility<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> for all the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent:<s%> and a <S%H2114>stranger<s%> shall not come near to <S%H7126>you.<s%>

"You shall <S%H8104>perform<s%> the <S%H4931>duty<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> and the <S%H4931>duty<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar;<s%> that there be no more <S%H7110>wrath<s%> on the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3947>I,<s%> behold, I have taken your <S%H251>brothers<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> to you they are a <S%H4979>gift,<s%> <S%H5414>given<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting.<s%>

You and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> with you shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> your <S%H3550>priesthood<s%> for <S%H1697>everything<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and for that <S%H1004>within<s%> the <S%H6532>veil;<s%> and you shall <S%H5647>serve:<s%> I <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H3550>priesthood<s%> as a <S%H5656>service<s%> of <S%H4979>gift:<s%> and the <S%H2114>stranger<s%> who comes <S%H7131>near<s%> shall be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H5414>"I,<s%> behold, I have given you the command of my wave <S%H8641>offerings,<s%> even all the holy <S%H6944>things<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> to you have I <S%H5414>given<s%> them by reason of the <S%H4888>anointing,<s%> and to your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> as a <S%H2706>portion<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

This shall be yours of the <S%H6944>most<s%> holy <S%H6944>things<s%> from the <S%H784>fire:<s%> every <S%H7133>offering<s%> of <S%H4503>theirs,<s%> even every meal offering of <S%H2403>theirs,<s%> and every sin offering of <S%H817>theirs,<s%> and every trespass offering of <S%H7725>theirs,<s%> which they shall render to <S%H6944>me,<s%> shall be most <S%H6944>holy<s%> for you and for your <S%H1121>sons.<s%>
You shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of it like the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2145>things.<s%> Every male shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of <S%H6944>it.<s%> It shall be holy to you.

"This is <S%H8641>yours,<s%> too: the wave offering of their <S%H4976>gift,<s%> even all the wave <S%H8573>offerings<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> them to <S%H1121>you,<s%> and to your sons and to your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> with <S%H2706>you,<s%> as a portion <S%H5769>forever.<s%> Everyone who is <S%H2889>clean<s%> in your <S%H1004>house<s%> shall eat of <S%H398>it.<s%>

"All the <S%H2459>best<s%> of the <S%H3323>oil,<s%> and all the <S%H2459>best<s%> of the <S%H8492>vintage,<s%> and of the <S%H1715>grain,<s%> the first <S%H7225>fruits<s%> of them which they <S%H5414>give<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to you have I given <S%H5414>them.<s%>

The <S%H1061>first-ripe<s%> fruits of all that is in their <S%H776>land,<s%> which they <S%H935>bring<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> shall be <S%H2889>yours;<s%> everyone who is clean in your <S%H1004>house<s%> shall eat of <S%H398>it.<s%>
"Everything <S%H2764>devoted<s%> in Israel shall be <S%H3478>yours.<s%>

Everything that <S%H6363>opens<s%> the <S%H7358>womb,<s%> of all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> which they <S%H7126>offer<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> both of <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>animal<s%> shall be <S%H6299>yours:<s%> nevertheless you shall surely <S%H6299>redeem<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> and you shall <S%H6299>redeem<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H929>animals.<s%>

You shall <S%H6299>redeem<s%> those who are to be <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> of them from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> according to your <S%H6187>estimation,<s%> for <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>money,<s%> after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> (the same is <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H1626>gerahs<s%>).

"But you shall not <S%H6299>redeem<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of a <S%H7794>cow,<s%> or the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of a <S%H3775>sheep,<s%> or the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of a <S%H5795>goat.<s%> They are <S%H6944>holy.<s%> You shall <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> their <S%H1818>blood<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> their <S%H2459>fat<s%> for an offering made by <S%H801>fire,<s%> for a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
Their <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall be <S%H8573>yours,<s%> as the wave offering <S%H2373>breast<s%> and as the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H7785>thigh,<s%> it shall be yours.

All the wave <S%H8641>offerings<s%> of the holy <S%H6944>things,<s%> which the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7311>offer<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> have I <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H1121>you,<s%> and your sons and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> with <S%H2706>you,<s%> as a portion <S%H5769>forever:<s%> it is a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H4417>salt<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to you and to your seed with <S%H2233>you.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> "You shall have no <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> in their <S%H776>land,<s%> neither shall you have any <S%H2506>portion<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H2506>them.<s%> I am your portion and your <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"To the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> <S%H5414>behold,<s%> I have given all the tithe in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2500>for<s%> an <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> in return <S%H2500>for<s%> their <S%H5656>service<s%> which they <S%H5647>serve,<s%> even the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting.<s%>

<S%H5750>Henceforth<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall not come <S%H7126>near<s%> the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> lest they <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H2399>sin,<s%> and <S%H4191>die.<s%>

But the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> and they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity:<s%> it shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations;<s%> and <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> they shall <S%H5157>have<s%> no <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

For the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> which they <S%H7311>offer<s%> as a wave <S%H8641>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance:<s%> therefore I have <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8432>them,<s%> 'Among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> they shall <S%H5157>have<s%> no <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>'"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"Moreover you shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H3947>them,<s%> 'When you take of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> which I have <S%H5414>given<s%> you from them for your <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> then you shall <S%H7311>offer<s%> up a wave <S%H8641>offering<s%> of it for <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> a <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of the <S%H4643>tithe.<s%>

Your wave <S%H8641>offering<s%> shall be <S%H2803>reckoned<s%> to <S%H1715>you,<s%> as though it were the grain of the <S%H1637>threshing<s%> <S%H4395>floor,<s%> and as the fullness of the <S%H3342>winepress.<s%>

Thus you also shall <S%H7311>offer<s%> a wave <S%H8641>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of all your <S%H4643>tithes,<s%> which you <S%H3947>receive<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and of it you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s wave <S%H8641>offering<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

Out of all your <S%H4979>gifts<s%> you shall <S%H7311>offer<s%> every wave <S%H8641>offering<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> of all its <S%H2459>best,<s%> even the holy part of it out of <S%H4720>it.<s%>'

"Therefore you shall <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H7311>them,<s%> 'When you heave its <S%H2459>best<s%> from <S%H2803>it,<s%> then it shall be reckoned to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> as the <S%H8393>increase<s%> of the <S%H1637>threshing<s%> <S%H8393>floor,<s%> and as the increase of the <S%H3342>winepress.<s%>

You shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it in every <S%H4725>place,<s%> you and your <S%H1004>households:<s%> for it is your <S%H7939>reward<s%> in return <S%H2500>for<s%> your <S%H5656>service<s%> in the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting.<s%>

You shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> no <S%H2399>sin<s%> by reason of <S%H7311>it,<s%> when you have heaved from it its <S%H2459>best:<s%> and you shall not <S%H2490>profane<s%> the holy <S%H6944>things<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that you not <S%H4191>die.<s%>'"
